title: 85x12: Limitations on Employee’s Operation of Outside Business Activity
summary:
Several statutes and regulations impose restrictions on the business activities and compensation of employee who owns a business and is interested in bidding on Government contracts.   

Notes: [Note: The 18 U.S.C. § 203 analysis in this opinion was modified by OGE Informal Advisory Opinion 99x25.] [cites former 5 C.F.R. part 735.]
